Top Navigation
Top Navigation
Component
Overview
Top navigation is a horizontal menu typically located at the top of an application interface. It provides users with easy access to the main sections or features of the site or app, enhancing navigation and usability.
 
            
<section>
  <div style="position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 3.5rem; background-color: var(--primary); display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; padding: 0 .8rem; box-shadow: var(--shadow-primary);">
    <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; column-gap: 1rem;">
